description.value:
You can squeeze out of tight situations surprisingly quickly, gaining an advantage against foes that try to pin you down. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Quick Squeeze]{Quick Squeeze} skill feat, and if you're a master in Acrobatics, you can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Squeeze]{Squeeze} at full Speed.

Whenever you successfully @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Escape]{Escape} using Acrobatics, the creature you Escaped from is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} against the next attack you make against it before the end of your next turn.
